I recommend this game because of the how competitive this game was
But also i have a problem with this game
1. A lot of cheater in this game, I prefer play it with Faceit or prime status
2. The toxic community, this game has a lot of toxic people. Also there is racist people as well

But what makes it good was
1. The shooting mechanics is very good, this is one of my best game shooting mechanics i have ever played
2. The map was pretty good, I didn't get bored of it

So overall, i recommend this game if you get Faceit or prime status
